skills.name: LAW AND ORDER
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Inflict Seal on the enemy for 1 turn.
• 50% Chance to Reduce Power or Fury of the enemy to zero if Permadeath is present on the target.

skills.name: BACKUP CALL
desc: • Increase DEF and MR of allies for 2 turns.
• Grant Critical Strike Chance to allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: UNDYING
desc: • Endure a random ally for 2 turns at the start of your turn..
